JOB DESCRIPTION: We are looking for an immediate joiner with 1+ years working experience as a PHP Developer, who has hands-on experience in Codeigniter/Laravel framework.     Responsibilities and Duties     Strong knowledge in PHP with Codeigniter/Laravel.   Knowledge of Full life cycle application development.   Design, code and debug software.   Integrate new software solutions with existing systems.   Extract and reverse engineer existing code.     Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications     Hands on Experience in web applications (PHP, Codeigniter, Laravel)   Knowledge with front-end technologies such as Javascript, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS, jQuery   Knowledge of working with GitHub.   Should have experience ofAPI integration.   Experience working on Apache HTTP or any other server.   Experience using MySQL, PostgreSQL.   Solid experience in design, coding, unit testing and debugging.   Experience working in Agile development environment.   Good Communication Skill
